item.title: YouTube Video Script Writer - Travel Niche - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: YouTube Video Script Writer - Travel Niche

About Us:
We are an exciting YouTube channel dedicated to uncovering the best travel destinations, hidden gems, and unique experiences from around the world. Our mission is to inspire and guide our audience with original, high-quality travel content that is both informative and entertaining.

Job Description:
We are looking for a passionate and creative YouTube Video Script Writer specializing in travel content. The ideal candidate will be a native/fluent English speaker, have an excellent command of the English language, and the ability to produce original scripts that captivate and engage our audience without relying on plagiarism or AI-generated material. You will be responsible for researching travel destinations, creating compelling narratives, and developing scripts that align with our channel’s vision.

Responsibilities:

Conduct thorough research on travel destinations, cultures, attractions, and experiences to ensure accuracy and originality.
Write engaging, informative, and entertaining scripts for travel-focused YouTube videos.
Collaborate with the production team to develop ideas and concepts for travel videos.
Ensure all content is original, free of plagiarism, and not reliant on AI-generated content.
Adapt and revise scripts based on feedback from the team.
Stay updated with current travel trends and best practices in video content creation.

Qualifications:

Proven experience as a scriptwriter or content writer, preferably in the travel niche.
Exceptional writing, editing, and proofreading skills.
Strong research skills and attention to detail.
Ability to produce original and engaging travel content.
Knowledge of SEO and digital content strategies is a plus.
Familiarity with YouTube content creation and audience engagement.
Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

How to Apply:
If you possess the skills to create captivating content, we want to hear from you! Please submit three samples of your writing, preferably scripts related to travel content.

We look forward to discovering your creative talent and welcoming you to our dynamic team!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 24, 2024 00:53 UTC
Category: Scriptwriting
Skills:SEO Keyword Research, Content Creation, YouTube SEO, Social Media Content Creation
Skills: SEO Keyword Research, Content Creation, YouTube SEO, Social Media Content Creation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hiring YouTube Editor to edit Educational videos. (Languages Niche, Examples below)

Want to join a fun team where you can grow?

This will be a long term position. Includes Bonuses and Perks.

You will be editing between 1-2 videos a week.  (Between 4-60 minutes)

Requirements:
• Sound Design
• Color Grading
• Motion Graphics
• Team Player
• Great communicator
• Looking for long term position
• Advanced editing skills
• Edited educational videos in the past
• NO AGENCY ALLOWED. Must be an individual

Examples of edits:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DAp_v7EH9AA
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=psmqsw8n2ck
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z2nZbldecrg

Please include samples of your work. Applications without samples will not be looked at.

If you agree to all the terms above. Comment ''Banana'' at the beginning of your application.

Looking forward to seeing your great work and working together!


Posted On: June 24, 2024 00:53 UTC

item.title: Youtube Video Editor for Short Form Ebook Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Youtube video editor to create 3 short form videos for our ebook. The videos will be used to promote the ebook on social media platforms. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing Youtube videos and be able to create visually appealing and engaging content. The videos should be around 1-2 minutes in length and include relevant graphics, text overlays, and background music. The editor should have a good understanding of video storytelling and be able to convey the main concepts of the ebook in an engaging way. Required skills include:

- Proficiency in video editing software
- Knowledge of Youtube video editing best practices
- Ability to create eye-catching graphics and text overlays
- Strong communication skills
- Attention to detail

Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 00:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Graphic Designer for Instagram Post Visuals on Futures Trading - Upwork
item.description:
Will pay $5 per post

We are seeking a talented and creative Graphic Designer to join our team and generate visually compelling Instagram posts for our futures trading account. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of design principles, experience with social media content creation, and a passion for finance and trading.

Responsibilities:
Create high-quality, engaging, and on-brand visual content for Instagram posts.

Design graphics that effectively communicate complex trading concepts in an easily understandable and visually appealing manner.

Develop a consistent visual style and theme for the Instagram account.

Stay updated with the latest design trends and social media best practices.
Produce graphics that include charts, quotes, tips, educational content, and promotional materials.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a Graphic Designer, particularly in creating social media content.

Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator) or similar tools.

Understanding of futures trading and the ability to translate complex concepts into simple, attractive visuals.

Excellent attention to detail and creativity.

Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience in the finance or trading industry.
Knowledge of motion graphics and video editing tools.
Familiarity with Instagram analytics and insights.
How to Apply:
Please submit your application with the following:

A brief introduction about yourself and why you’re a good fit for this role.
A link to your portfolio, highlighting relevant work.
Any additional information that you think would be helpful.
We look forward to seeing your creative work and how you can contribute to our growing futures trading community on Instagram!

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 24, 2024 00:35 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Imagery, Illustration, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Instagram, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe InDesign
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Imagery, Illustration, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Instagram, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe InDesign
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Lots of short videos for social media - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone who is creative. I cannot send an example because have not seen any videos like this.

Please please please do not contact me unless you read this description fully and understand what the project is about. It is NOT a cash cow or whatever!

No AI, no stock footage. Real movie clips and real music.

Idea is to have lots of short videos, not shorts and lots of YouTube channels, maybe with just 1 video

Example of 1 video title is,' Can my phone hurt me?'

Video opens with a movie clip of people saying yes yes yes

Brief text explaining why and how, Voice-over after giving people time to read the text.

End video with some music

Every video will have explanatory text and links to campaigning websites with lots of research to back up the video and verify information.

Idea is the videos are shocking, dramatic and with a touch of humour.

It's a controversial topic; I have spent the last 2 years researching it and it has been traumatic finding out the real truth.

Man made electromagnetic radiation is NOT as safe as the lying industry and their pet scientist would have people believe. There are over 2000 solid, peer-reviewed studies clearly showing harmful biological effects for every living organism on our planet. Regulatory authorities completely ignore this research.

Never in the history of science has so much evidence been Ignored and dismissed .

The Environmental Health Trust sued the FCC for ignoring scientific research showing harmful effects including cancer and they won the case. The judge rebuked the FCC for not considering ALL of the available research and told them to do that but so far they have not.

Please check out the Environmental Health Trust website to give you a good background of the project. The videos on it are usually too long, they speak while showing text and or they are too scientific for the man in the street.

The main objective is to wake people up that their phones are not completely safe and to advise them not to keep the phone close to their body. There has been a dramatic rise in cancers among younger people.

Thanks for reading this far. Please do not contact me with information about how good you are, what programs you use, I haven't got a clue anyway.

Please contact me if you looked at the website and want to change what is happening . Thank you.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 00:15 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Nonfiction, Documentary, M4V, Elearning Video, Video Production
Skills: Nonfiction, Documentary, M4V, Elearning Video, Video Production
Country: Thailand
click to apply

item.title: Audio to video - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to take an mp3 file and create a video with stock videos and overlay subtitles. I want the videos to be like these:
https://youtu.be/OiZx5zAx87Y?si=POFYyeEcWEA_-8iS

Please provide an estimate on a per video basis. Right now I’m doing audio for each psalm in the Bible and the audio files are around 2-5 minutes each. I am looking for someone to work with longer for a YouTube channel. Please only reply with quotes per video. I can provide lyrics  that need the overlay as the text is spoken but will need someone to sync it to the video. I’m ok with anyone using AI or any program to make the work faster but still need quality to match the video above.


Posted On: June 23, 2024 23:51 UTC

item.title: Video Editor for Online Class - Upwork
item.description:
I filmed videos for an online class that needed to be edited. Many of the videos just need to be cut so that the dialogue is fluent and smooth. There will be approximately 30 videos altogether with scripts to guide you.

Video lengths will be 2 minutes to 10 minutes each. Most are under 5 minutes.

I will want an editor that uses Premiere Pro so that I can get the final project files to continue to add the visuals that need to be added on my end.

Please share with me how we will send files back and forth so I can understand your workflow.

item.title: Talented Video Editor for eLearning Courses and Professional Development Presentations - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a talented video editor who can clean up our videos for our eLearning courses and professional development presentations. The ideal candidate should have a strong eye for detail and the ability to enhance the overall quality of the videos. This includes removing any unnecessary elements, improving audio quality, and ensuring smooth transitions between scenes. The videos will be used for educational purposes, so it is important that the editor understands how to maintain a professional and engaging tone. The ability to work efficiently and meet deadlines is crucial.      

Relevant skills:
- Video editing
- Audio enhancement
- Transition effects

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $10.00-$18.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 23:31 UTC
Category: Presentation Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Education, Video Editing, Elearning, Video Production
Skills: Graphic Design, Education, Video Editing, Elearning, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply
item.ns0:encoded:
We are in need of a talented video editor who can clean up our videos for our eLearning courses and professional development presentations. The ideal candidate should have a strong eye for detail and the ability to enhance the overall quality of the videos. This includes removing any unnecessary elements, improving audio quality, and ensuring smooth transitions between scenes.
